summary: This document is a deposit account opening application from Deutsche Asset & Wealth Management, detailing various account types and the responsibilities of account holders. It outlines the requirements for identification and compliance with anti-money laundering regulations, as well as the terms and conditions for joint accounts and other banking services.
keyFacts: The document outlines the requirements for establishing a deposit account, including identification and verification of individuals.
It emphasizes the legal obligations of financial institutions to combat money laundering and terrorist financing.
The application includes terms for joint accounts, indicating that funds may be released to any owner during their lifetime.
There are references to compliance responsibilities for non-US individuals and organizations regarding tax obligations.
The document mentions the need for clients to notify the bank of any material changes to their information.
